column1: Users can display the list of books by selecting "Books".
Users can navigate through book list pages using the "Next" button or page numbers.
Users can filter books by specifying a date range.
Users cannot filter books if the date range input is not specified.
Users cannot filter books if the date range format is incorrect.
Users cannot navigate beyond the last page of books.
Users cannot navigate to a non-existent page number.
Users navigate back to the first page of books after reaching the last page.
